messages.title: ELECTION CHOICE
messages.content: Jeremy Corbyn’s Labour can’t win here Boris Johnson can’t be trusted Lib Dems CAN WIN for YOU

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Transforming mental health services by treating mental health with the same urgency as physical health.
Use the £50 billion Remain Bonus to invest in public services and tackling inequality.
Generating 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulating all low-income homes by 2025.
Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills & training throughout their lives.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: GIVE EVERY CHILD THE BEST START
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Hire 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Liberal Democrats can beat Boris Johnson’s Conservative here. Conservatives and Lib Dems on Hart District Council. There are no Labour or Greens.

issues.economy: Build a fairer economy. Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills & training throughout their lives.
issues.education: Give every child the best start. Hire 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
issues.environment: Tackle the climate emergency. Generating 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulating all low-income homes by 2025.
issues.health: Save our NHS. Transforming mental health services by treating mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

images.caption: Graham - Building a brighter future for North East Hampshire
